name: Deep Presentation Template
description:
Big presentation template for all occasions. Easy to use and customize.


Includes 130 slide types (65 light and 65 dark):


  • Covers
  • Sections
  • Text, Images and Text + Images multicolumns
  • Text + Illustrations
  • Quotes Text
  • Main Text
  • Lists (vertical, horizontal, numbered, icons)
  • Mockups (phones, laptop and smart watch)
  • Charts
  • Flow
  • Timeline
  • Gantt diagram
  • Table
  • Team
  • Author
  • Thanks


--


Based by Material Design Colors & Icons, includes 50+ free images and illustations.
